nodes.documentation: @title Interface for contracts conforming to ERC-721: Non-Fungible Tokens
nodes.name: ERC721

nodes.documentation:
@title Auction Core
 @dev Contains models, variables, and internal methods for the auction.
nodes.name: ClockAuctionBase

nodes.documentation: @dev DON'T give me your money.

nodes.name: _owns
_escrow
_transfer
_addAuction

nodes.documentation: @dev Cancels an auction unconditionally.
nodes.name: _cancelAuction

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (bool)
function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Computes the price and transfers winnings.
 Does NOT transfer ownership of token.
nodes.name: _bid

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes an auction from the list of open auctions.
 @param _tokenId - ID of NFT on auction.
nodes.name: _removeAuction

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns true if the NFT is on auction.
 @param _auction - Auction to check.
nodes.name: _isOnAuction

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns current price of an NFT on auction. Broken into two
  functions (this one, that computes the duration from the auction
  structure, and the other that does the price computation) so we
  can easily test that the price computation works correctly.
nodes.name: _currentPrice

nodes.documentation:
@dev Computes the current price of an auction. Factored out
  from _currentPrice so we can run extensive unit tests.
  When testing, make this function public and turn on
  `Current price computation` test suite.
nodes.name: _computeCurrentPrice

nodes.documentation:
@dev Computes owner's cut of a sale.
 @param _price - Sale price of NFT.
nodes.name: _computeCut
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation: @title Clock auction for non-fungible tokens.
nodes.name: ClockAuction

nodes.documentation:
@dev Remove all Ether from the contract, which is the owner's cuts
  as well as any Ether sent directly to the contract address.
  Always transfers to the NFT contract, but can be called either by
  the owner or the NFT contract.
nodes.name: withdrawBalance
createAuction
bid

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (bool)

nodes.name: cancelAuction

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (bool)

nodes.name: cancelAuctionWhenPaused

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns auction info for an NFT on auction.
 @param _tokenId - ID of NFT on auction.
nodes.name: getAuction

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (bool)
function (struct ClockAuctionBase.Auction storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the current price of an auction.
 @param _tokenId - ID of the token price we are checking.
nodes.name: getCurrentPrice

nodes.documentation: @title Clock auction modified for sale of narcos
nodes.name: SaleClockAuction
createAuction

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates lastSalePrice if seller is the nft contract
 Otherwise, works the same as default bid method.
nodes.name: bid
